original_text: this re-do is so dumb and so exploitative in its violence that , ironically , it becomes everything that the rather clumsy original was railing against .
generated_text:
1. "This sequel is a complete waste of time, relying on cheap thrills and gore to keep the audience entertained, rather than actual storytelling."
2. "The remake is a lazy, soulless cash-grab, lacking the charm and wit of the original, and instead focusing on mindless violence and destruction."
3. "This rehashing of a classic is a cynical attempt to cash in on nostalgia, using cheap special effects and gratuitous violence to appeal to the lowest common denominator."
4. "The reboot is a shallow, exploitative mess, prioritizing shock value over substance, and leaving the audience feeling empty and unsatisfied."
